specLoginRequired.title: Sign in to Generate Specs
specLoginRequired.description: Transform your test cases into organized specification documents with AI.
specLoginRequired.benefit1Description: Automatically organize tests into domains, features, and behaviors
specLoginRequired.benefit2Description: Generate as many spec documents as you need

header.title: Simple, transparent pricing
header.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs

promotion.title: Early Access: Pro features FREE!
promotion.description: Sign up now and enjoy Pro features at no cost during our launch period

specview.question: What is an AI Spec Document?
specview.answer: An AI Spec Document automatically organizes your test cases into domains, features, and behaviors. It helps you understand your test status at a glance.

analysis.question: What is Analysis?
analysis.answer: Analysis parses your repository's test files and extracts test cases, frameworks, and statistics. It's the foundation for understanding your test suite.

paymentLive.question: When will payments go live?
paymentLive.answer: We're currently in early access. Paid plans will be introduced in the first half of this year. Early users will receive special benefits and advance notice.

retention.question: What is data retention?
retention.answer: Retention period determines how long you can access your dashboard history and generated AI spec documents. Repository analysis results are kept regardless of your plan.
